Name: Neko Chan
About the game: Introduction Neko Chan is the exclusive desktop elf of the STEAM platform created specifically for STEAM players, you can place her on your computer desktop, she will walk around on your desktop, and steal your mouse when you don't notice. The naughty Neko Chan can bring more joy to your boring life. Neko Chan will bring you all kinds of gifts from outside the desktop Every once in a while: a text, a picture, a toy, even a piece of music, a video. As a player, you can even set up your favorite songs and movies as gifts and have the Neko Chan bring them to your desktop. Neko Chan has dozens of outfits, including hair, tiaras and costume, you can switch whatever you like, with hundreds of combinations to create your own unique desktop elf. You can also customize some of Neko Chan's behaviors, including the waiting time for stealing the mouse, the wait time for getting a gift, and the limit on the type of gift and the maximum number of gifts. The game supports the Steam Workshop, where you can create more gifts and immediately share them with other users. features Super cute desktop elf Stealing the mouse Get a gift Music playback Video playback Custom character dress-up Steam workshop
